tasks.task: "I hope all of these tips help set you up to have a restorative oasis amidst your probably busy urban environment that you're living in. And that this summer, whatever you grow, you keep growing joy." So the enjoyment is part of the concluding thought. Therefore, it might not be a separate MAINTASK but more of a closing sentiment. Thus, perhaps combining the tasks related to HappygardeningEnjoying.
